mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow_model(model_id, model_name, model_status, department_id, applyUser_id, apply_time, startNode_id, endNode_id, start_time, end_time, approveType_id, approveAuthority_id, approveUsers_id) VALUES (#{modelId},#{modelName},#{modelStatus},#{departmentId},#{applyUserId},#{applyTime},#{startNodeId},#{endNodeId} ,#{startTime},#{endTime},#{approveTypeId},#{approveAuthorityId}ï¼Œ#{approveUsersId})
